newsitem.title: USA: Freddie Mac to redeem $50 mln debenture issue.
newsitem.headline: Freddie Mac to redeem $50 mln debenture issue.

text.p: Freddie Mac said Monday that on June 3 it will redeem the entire $50 million principal amount of its 7.275 percent fixed-rate debenture issue with cusip number 3134A0J52.
The issue, originally set to mature May 15, 2001, will be redeemed at a price equal to 100 percent of the principal amount.
Payment of principal plus interest accrued to the redemption date will be made to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 2, 1997, Freddie Mac said.
Freddie Mac is a corporation chartered by Congress that buys mortgages from lenders and packages them into securities for investors.
